Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

properties.name: baseSalary
properties.description: The base salary of the job.

properties.name: benefits
properties.description: Description of benefits associated with the job.

properties.name: datePosted
properties.description: Publication date for the job posting.

properties.name: educationRequirements
properties.description: Educational background needed for the position.

properties.name: employmentType
properties.description: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).

properties.name: experienceRequirements
properties.description: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.

properties.name: incentives
properties.description: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.

properties.name: industry
properties.description: The industry associated with the job position.

properties.name: jobLocation
properties.description: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.

properties.name: occupationalCategory
properties.description: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.

properties.name: qualifications
properties.description: Specific qualifications required for this role.

properties.name: salaryCurrency
properties.description: The currency (coded using ISO 4217, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 used for the main salary information in this job posting.

properties.name: skills
properties.description: Skills required to fulfill this role.

properties.name: specialCommitments
properties.description: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.

properties.name: workHours
properties.description: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).
